name: Recap Compressed Structured Scan Data File

description: You will only encounter RCC files if you use Autodesk Recap software and have imported data gathered from a structured scan. The files can be found in the "Support" folder with a project created by Recap if it includes data from a structured scan. The folder may also include LLT, DIFF, RCS, and THUMBNAIL files. Structured scan data is typically collected using Leica, Faro, Riegl, Z+F, Trimble, and Topcon 3D laser scanners.
